title: Squaremile777
author: Squaremile777
created_time: March 04, 2023, 03:08:10 PMLast edit: March 04, 2023, 03:29:35 PM by Squaremile777
content: Long story short: Im looking for people to join who want to make profit according to my instructions. Im looking for people who join with this for life.Im not looking for those who just try and leave.Requirements for person who can join with the new crypto bankers and financiers family: You need be inspired If banking money flows,investing,markets, liquity,global finances.Best If your mindset Will be: "i create nothing but i own everything" you should want to be like wall street girl/guy.Off course we don't cheat or cheat each others we play by the rules and we help each others any ways as possible.The best example of our activites would be movie: "Margin Call" The crypto have given us opportunity what we could not done before we can move our funds kind of privately between the wallets and exchangers and by doing it right way we can make wealth bigger and bigger.So tell me If you want to join but remember join only If you truly want to be banker you like to move money around and you are inspired by money flows and capital Investments and you don't want to do any other work then just playing with money and Directing money into your pockets and into your team.Thank you ! Let's see what will be the outcome of this,you just need to have right mindset that's it off course it's not for everybody you need to be with kind of banker soul.

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: Squaremile777 on March 04, 2023, 03:08:10 PMOff course we don't cheat or cheat each others we play by the rules "Welcome to Fight Club. The first rule of Fight Club is: you do not talk about Fight Club."Welcome to the scam announcement. The first rule is that every scam announcement looks so shady that even its creator doesn't really believe in it, so "girl/guy" has to say, "We don't cheat" or "We are not scammers."

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: It is the longest introduction I have heard in a while and I did not understand what you are trying to convey in the end, who tells you that we will not scammed is the one who thinks of scamming so try to make the motivation of others to join you are logical and economic reasons instead of a lot of words.You are a newbie and without previous experience, so can you tell us what we will benefit from joining you.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: Squaremile777 on March 04, 2023, 03:08:10 PMLong story short: Im looking for people to join who want to make profit according to my instructions. ..As I understand it, such instructions will not be free, so you need to immediately indicate the cost of such participation in the team. In addition, you need to document that your qualifications meet the set goals, and accordingly, following your recommendations will not entail the loss of the deposit.

comments.author: joniboini
comments.body: You sound like a cult leader tbh. What exactly are you offering here? A pump and dump group? An insider trading group? A group that helps exchanges manipulate their trading activity? Crypto bankers and financial teams are so ambiguous you might as well call them crypto scammers.You mention margin call, but do you actually understand it? What do you mean by that? Why would anyone deposit money to you when you have no background, no company in the business, and no profile at all? At best, you'd just attract another scammer to participate in your activity. Hopefully no one is dumb enough to give money and allow some random dude on the internet manage their trading activities.
